Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

You concentrate all of your energy to deliver a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D6a4phlAxmixy2lo]{Hakaze} fueled by fire-aligned aether. Until the end of your current turn, your next Hakaze will summon the spirit of a wyrm that will travel the battlefield in a @Template[type:line|distance:90] in a direction of your choice, dealing @Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2)d8[fire]] damage, this damage has a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save, and bypasses any resistance from incorporeal creatures, as well as immunities to fire damage, treating them as resistance equal to the creature's level.

Any creature that fails their save become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure.
